---
title: Looking to crowdsource a few
categories: Custom Moves
tags: ['looking', 'looking', 'crowdsource', 'interesting']
author: Matthew Everhart
link: https://plus.google.com/115610991532630554135/posts/VFToqz6VCqJ
published: 2017-07-11T19:58:58.846Z
updated: 2017-07-11T19:58:58.846Z
imagelink: []
thumblinks: []
---

Looking to crowdsource a few interesting follower moves (a la perilous wilds) for a bare-knuckled  half-orc dervish, a heavily armored dwarven tunnel guard and a polearm-wielding paladin of a sun goddess.  <br /><br />One of them (as determined by custom move via a love letter) will be accompanying my 8yr old&#39;s Swordmage as we kick off our family Kingmaker DW style campaign this weekend... I am looking forward to reading your suggestions! <br />
<div id='comment z13atvx41wj3dbwpc04cirexdkekj3tjdd4'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/100166690471780012764_photo.jpg'> Horst Wurst</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-07-11 21:01:52 (edited: 2017-07-11 21:01:52)</cite></p>
        <p>I don´t have any interesting ones but these are well within the tropes of the hobby:<br />Half-Orc: *Smash something or someone. Instinct:  To look for trouble<br />Dwarf: *I got your back. Instinct:  Oh that shiny gold<br />Paladin: *Charge into combat. Instinct: To judge<br /></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13atvx41wj3dbwpc04cirexdkekj3tjdd4'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/102595580176380683252_photo.jpg'> Jeremy Strandberg</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-07-12 00:23:20 (edited: 2017-07-12 01:49:55)</cite></p>
        <p><b>Six-Punch Khamsin</b>: bare-knuckled half-orc dervish<br /><i>Faith-wise, Athletic, Clever, Hardy, Warrior</i><br /><br />Quality +1, Loyalty +1<br />HP 9, Armor 1 (reflexes)<br />Fists, knees, whatever (hand), d8 damage<br />• Fight like a one-man crowd<br />• Take a beating<br />• Dole out useful advice masked as folksy aphorism<br />Instinct: to watch while things get out of hand<br />Cost: amusement<br /><br /><br /><i><a href="https://plus.google.com/photos/102595580176380683252/albums/6441673555780315985/6441673561685077010" data-embed="_" data-attachment-render-hint="2" class="ot-anchor">https://plus.google.com/photos/...</a></i></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13atvx41wj3dbwpc04cirexdkekj3tjdd4'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/102595580176380683252_photo.jpg'> Jeremy Strandberg</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-07-12 00:24:18 (edited: 2017-07-12 01:50:26)</cite></p>
        <p><b>Fjola Anvilheart</b>: heavily armored dwarven tunnel guard<br /><i>Stone-wise, Cautious, Hardy, Organized, Warrior</i><br /><br />Quality +1, Loyalty +1<br />HP 9, Armor 3 (breastplate, chain, greaves)<br />Warhammer, sword (close) or knife (hand), d8 damage<br />• Hold her position against all comers<br />• Point out the stupidity of an idea<br />• Colorfully insult someone&#39;s parentage or predilections <br />Instinct: to question their leadership<br />Cost: competence and good sense<br /><br /><br /><i><a href="https://plus.google.com/photos/102595580176380683252/albums/6441673807739273329/6441673805265081394" data-embed="_" data-attachment-render-hint="2" class="ot-anchor">https://plus.google.com/photos/...</a></i></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13atvx41wj3dbwpc04cirexdkekj3tjdd4'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/102595580176380683252_photo.jpg'> Jeremy Strandberg</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-07-12 00:28:49 (edited: 2017-07-12 01:51:32)</cite></p>
        <p><b>Leontius Prell</b>: paladin of the sun goddess<br />Goddess-wise, Athletic, Beautiful, Connected (all over), Magical, Warrior<br /><br />Quality +1, Loyalty +1<br />HP 9, Armor 2 (scale hauberk)<br />Halberd (reach) or dagger (hand), d8 damage<br />• Draw and hold attention to himself<br />• Bound and leap over obstacles<br />• Conjure a blazing, holy light<br />• Smolder<br />Instinct: to act impulsively<br />Cost: glory<br /><br /><br /><i><a href="https://plus.google.com/photos/102595580176380683252/albums/6441674973043984337/6441674976100232642" data-embed="_" data-attachment-render-hint="2" class="ot-anchor">https://plus.google.com/photos/...</a></i></p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z13atvx41wj3dbwpc04cirexdkekj3tjdd4'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/107608892144761520587_photo.jpg'> Michael Mendoza</h4>
      <p><cite>2017-07-12 16:51:10 (edited: 2017-07-12 16:51:10)</cite></p>
        <p>For the dervish:<br />- Sirocco strike (hit everyone within reach)<br />- Receive an ecstatic vision during combat</p>
</div>
